sentences.en: Chopper Heh. Here comes His Highness from the mainland now.
sentences.cn: 嗯. 从本土来的“殿下大人”现在到来了.

sentences.en: He was, according to witnesses, extremely wintry with Her Royal Highness.
sentences.cn: 据目击者称，他对女王殿下极其冷淡。

sentences.en: Her Highness commands you to take her handmaiden with you.
sentences.cn: 女王陛下命令你们带上她的女仆.

sentences.en: Her Royal Highness has definite views about most things.
sentences.cn: 女王陛下对大多数事情都有明确的观点。

sentences.en: Here is some letter for you , your royal highness.
However, since his Highness desires it, let her attend the Court.
sentences.cn: 不过, 既然殿下同意, 可以让她到宫廷谒见.

sentences.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I give Royal Highness, the Prince of Wales.
sentences.cn: 女士们,先生们, 请为威尔士亲王殿下干杯.

sentences.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I give you his Royal Highness, the Prince of Wales.
sentences.cn: 女士们,先生们, 请为威尔士亲王殿下乾杯.

sentences.en: Stepmother: In the honor of His Highness, the prince.
sentences.cn: 继母: 是为王子殿下举办的.

sentences.en: That would be best, Your Highness.
The highness of the wall prevents thieves from entering.
sentences.cn: 那垛墙砌得很高,可防止窃贼进入.

sentences.en: The title of Royal Highness is borne by the Duke of Edinburgh.
sentences.cn: 皇家殿下这个称呼是由爱丁堡公爵创造的.

sentences.en: Will that be all, Your Highness?
Your Highness is taking offence very unnecessarily.

words.tran_cn: 殿下，阁下；高度，高位；高尚，高贵

trans.tran_cn: 殿下，阁下（用作对皇室成员的尊称）
trans.tran_en: the condition of being high or lofty
